name: typebot
description: Typebot is a self-hosted conversational form and chatbot builder that lets you design flows visually and embed them on websites. It supports integrations and webhooks and is also available as a cloud service.

features.title: Visual Flow Builder
features.description: Design conversational flows using a drag-and-drop visual interface without coding

features.title: Conditional Logic
features.description: Build dynamic flows that adapt based on user responses and data

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connect with webhooks, APIs, and third-party services for data collection and automation

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track completion rates, drop-off points, and user responses to optimize flows
